.Valid Usage (Implicit)
****
* [[VUID-vkGetInstanceProcAddr-instance-parameter]] If pname:instance is not `NULL`, pname:instance must: be a valid sname:VkInstance handle
* [[VUID-vkGetInstanceProcAddr-pName-parameter]] pname:pName must: be a null-terminated UTF-8 string
****
